text: Sian Heder (; born June 23, 1977) is an American writer and filmmaker. She is known for writing and directing the movie CODA (2021), for which she won the Academy Award for Best Adapted Screenplay and BAFTA Award for Best Adapted Screenplay. Heder was born in Cambridge, Massachusetts. Her parents are artists Mags Harries and Lajos HÃ©der. Her mother is Welsh and her father is Hungarian. She is married to David Newsom and has two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Massachusetts Category:Screenwriters from Massachusetts Category:Writers from Cambridge, Massachusetts Category:BAFTA Award winning writers Category:Academy Award winning writers
title: Sian Heder
